entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of freezing drizzle. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 8:24 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries changing to periods of light snow in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 8:24 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 8:24 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
